episodes.title: #18 Escaping the Cult: How BDSM Became Sergio's Erotic Salvation
episodes.description:
Bisexual. Celibate. Slave. Survivor.
In this episode of The Erotic Realm, I speak with Sergio, a 43 year old bisexual male slave who spent years in a religious cult, and the last four in celibacy.


We talk about erotic reclamation after cult life, redefining intimacy through BDSM, and the complex dance between submission and healing. From shame and silence to power exchange and surrender, Sergio offers a rare, reflective glimpse into the erotic psychology of someone rebuilding from the inside out.


p.s After recording, I learned that Sergio is now in a healthy and loving BDSM relationship. A beautiful evolution of the story you’ll hear today.


We explore:

     
     
  •  What makes someone identify as a slave—not just a submissive
     
     
  •  The psychology of celibacy and erotic suppression
     
     
  •  BDSM as a tool for healing and self-reclamation
     
     
     
  •  The long arc from indoctrination to intimacy
     
     
     
  •  Finding erotic power after religious shame
     
     
     

Research Discussed: I Was Taught to See Sexuality as Something Evil: A Qualitative Study on the Impact of a Cult Childhood on Sexual Development (https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Johannes-Jungbauer/publication/374030920_I_was_Taught_to_See_Sexuality_as_Something_Evil_A_Qualitative_Study_on_the_Impact_of_a_Cult_Childhood_on_Sexual_Development/links/650ab236c05e6d1b1c1d40aa/I-was-Taught-to-See-Sexuality-as-Something-Evil-A-Qualitative-Study-on-the-Impact-of-a-Cult-Childhood-on-Sexual-Development.pdf)
